member.name: D3D11_MAP_FLAG
member.summary: Specifies how the CPU should respond when an application calls the method on a resource that is being used by the GPU.

member.name: D3D11_MAP_FLAG.D3D11_MAP_FLAG_DO_NOT_WAIT
member.summary: Specifies that should return DXGI_ERROR_WAS_STILL_DRAWING when the GPU blocks the CPU from accessing a resource. For more information about this error code, see DXGI_ERROR.
